i18n.key: document title for strictly internal usage, used for document back-office display.
short title for navigation's elements (menus, breadcrumb, etc. - 80 characters max.)
full title displayed in your browser's title bar (corresponds to TITLE tag used for referencing).
description of the page for search engines
The start publication date indicates the date from which the users will be able to view the page. Before this date, the page will not be viewable.
The end publication date indicates the date to which the users will be able to view the page. After this date, the page will not be viewable anymore.
When set to ″Non″, an internal URL redirecting to the external site will be generated.
